parameter.name: targetProductFile
parameter.description: Output file

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: Specify the mode

parameter.name: resolution
parameter.description: Specify the target resolution

parameter.name: datastrip
parameter.description: Specify the datastrip directory

parameter.name: tile
parameter.description: Specify the tile folder

parameter.name: outputDir
parameter.description: Specify the output directory
parameter.alias:
Output directory:
(If not specified,
the input product
location is used)

parameter.name: workDir
parameter.description: Specify the working directory

parameter.name: imgDatabaseDir
parameter.description: Specify the database directory for L1C input images

parameter.name: resDatabaseDir
parameter.description: Specify the database directory for results and temporary products

parameter.name: processingCentre
parameter.description: Specify the processing centre as regex: ^[A-Z_]{4}$, e.g "SGS_"

parameter.name: archivingCentre
parameter.description: Specify the Archiving centre as regex: ^[A-Z_]{4}$, e.g. "SGS_"

parameter.name: processingBaseline
parameter.description: Specify the Processing baseline in the format: "dd.dd", where d=[0:9]

parameter.name: raw
parameter.description: Specify whether export raw images in rawl format with ENVI hdr

parameter.name: tif
parameter.description: Specify whether export raw images in TIFF format instead of JPEG-2000Export raw images in TIFF format instead of JPEG-2000

parameter.name: sceneOnly
parameter.description: Specify whether performs only the scene classification at 60 or 20m resolution

parameter.name: sceneClassification
parameter.description: Specify whether performs scene classification in Sen2Cor 2.9 mode

parameters.parameter:
sceneCog java.lang.Boolean= Specify whether export SCL image in COG format instead of JPEG_2000
false false RegularParameter

parameter.name: crOnly
parameter.description: Specify whether performs only the creation of the L2A product tree, no processing

parameter.name: Use_L2A_GIPP
parameter.description: Use configuration from GIPP file
parameter.alias:
L2A_GIPP file:
(If a file is selected,
the parameters below
will not be used)

parameter.name: row0
parameter.description: Specifies the midpoint of the region of interest or AUTO to detect automatically via an algorithm or OFF to disable ROI detection

parameter.name: col0
parameter.description: Specifies the midpoint of the region of interest or AUTO to detect automatically via an algorithm or OFF to disable ROI detection

parameter.name: nrow_win
parameter.description: Defines a rectangle around the midpoint in pixel

parameter.name: ncol_win
parameter.description: Defines a rectangle around the midpoint in pixel

parameter.name: Nr_Threads
parameter.description: Number of threads used for reading the OpenJPEG2 images

parameter.name: Product_Generator
parameter.description: Should be either a directory in the sen2cor home folder or 'NONE'. If NONE, Toolbox mode of operation will be used

parameter.name: DEM_Directory
parameter.description: Should be either a directory in the sen2cor home folder or 'NONE'. If NONE, no DEM will be used

parameter.name: DEM_Reference
parameter.description: Ignored if DEM is NONE. A DEM will be downloaded from this ref, if no local DEM

parameter.name: Aerosol_Type
parameter.description: Aerosol model

parameter.name: Mid_Latitude
parameter.description: Mid Latitude

parameter.name: Ozone_Content
parameter.description: Ozone content

parameter.name: WV_Correction
parameter.description: 0=no WV correction;1=correction with 940 nm band (default)

parameter.name: VIS_Update_Mode
parameter.description: 0=constant, 1=variable visibility

parameter.name: WV_Watermask
parameter.description: 0=not replaced;1=land-average;2=line-average

parameter.name: BRDF_Correction
parameter.description: 0=no correction; 1, 2: see IODD for explanation

parameter.name: BRDF_Lower_Bound
parameter.description: 0.2 to 0.25 is adequate, in extreme cases of overcorrection g=0.1 should be applied

parameter.name: Adj_Km
parameter.description: Adjancency Range [km]

parameter.name: Visibility
parameter.description: visibility (5 <= visibility <= 120 km)

parameter.name: Altitude
parameter.description: Altitude [km]

parameter.name: Smooth_WV_Map
parameter.description: length of square box, [meters]

parameter.name: WV_Threshold_Cirrus
parameter.description: water vapor threshold to switch off cirrus algorithm [cm] Range: 0.1-1.0

parameter.name: Database_Compression_Level
parameter.description: zlib compression level for image database [0-9, 0: best speed, 9: best size]

parameter.name: Use_L2A_CAL_SC_GIPP
parameter.description: Use configuration from L2A CAL SC GIPP file
parameter.alias:
L2A_CAL_SC_GIPP file:
(If a file is selected,
the parameters below
will not be used)

parameter.name: Use_L2A_CAL_AC_GIPP
parameter.description: Use configuration from L2A CAL AC GIPP file
parameter.alias:
L2A_CAL_AC_GIPP file:
(If a file is selected,
the parameters below
will not be used)

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B1
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B1, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B2
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B2, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B3
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B3, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B4
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B4, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B5
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B5, half maximum

parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B6, half maximum

parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B7, half maximum

parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B8, half maximum

parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B8A, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B9
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B9, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B10
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B10, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B11
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B11, half maximum

parameter.name: fwhm_Band_B12
parameter.description: specifies the full width for band B12, half maximum

parameter.name: AC_Min_Ddv_Area
parameter.description: Min DDV area, required number of reference pixels (th_percent)

parameter.name: AC_Swir_Refl_Lower_Th
parameter.description: SWIR reflectance lower threshold to exclude water pixels together with NDVI limit

parameter.name: AC_Swir_22um_Red_Refl_Ratio
parameter.description: SWIR-red reflectance ratio (0.4-0,6) (ratio_red_swir (2.2m), fact)

parameter.name: AC_Red_Blue_Refl_Ratio
parameter.description: Red-blue reflectance ratio (ratio_blu_red)

parameter.name: AC_Cut_Off_Aot_Iter_Vegetation
parameter.description: Cut off for AOT-iterations = max percentage of negative reflectance vegetation pixels (B4) (also reasonable for water pixels (B8)) (Thresh)

parameter.name: AC_Cut_Off_Aot_Iter_Water
parameter.description: Cut off for AOT-iterations = max percentage of negative reflectance water pixels (B8) (thresh)

parameter.name: AC_Aerosol_Type_Ratio_Th
parameter.description: Aerosol type ratio threshold (Scale path radiance for bands in the blue-to-red region)

parameter.name: AC_Topo_Corr_Th
parameter.description: Topographic correction threshold

parameter.name: AC_Slope_Th
parameter.description: Slope threshold

parameter.name: AC_Dem_P2p_Val
parameter.description: DEM Peak to Peak Value

parameter.name: AC_Swir_Refl_Ndvi_Th
parameter.description: SWIR reflectance NDVI threshold to exclude water pixels

parameter.name: AC_Ddv_Swir_Refl_Th1
parameter.description: DDV SWIR reflectance threshold 1, upper threshold

parameter.name: AC_Ddv_Swir_Refl_Th2
parameter.description: DDV SWIR reflectance threshold 2

parameter.name: AC_Ddv_Swir_Refl_Th3
parameter.description: DDV SWIR reflectance threshold 3

parameter.name: AC_Ddv_16um_Refl_Th1
parameter.description: DDV 1.6m reflectance threshold 1

parameter.name: AC_Ddv_16um_Refl_Th2
parameter.description: DDV 1.6m reflectance threshold 2

parameter.name: AC_Ddv_16um_Refl_Th3
parameter.description: DDV 1.6m reflectance threshold 3

parameter.name: AC_Dbv_Nir_Refl_Th
parameter.description: DBV NIR reflectance Threshold

parameter.name: AC_Dbv_Ndvi_Th
parameter.description: DBV NDVI threshold

parameter.name: AC_Red_Ref_Refl_Th
parameter.description: Red reference reflectance

parameter.name: AC_Dbv_Red_Veget_Tst_Ndvi_Th
parameter.description: DBV red vegetation test NDVI threshold

parameter.name: AC_Dbv_Red_Veget_Refl_Th
parameter.description: DBV red vegetation reflectance threshold

parameter.name: AC_Wv_Iter_Start_Summer
parameter.description: Start value for wv iterations

parameter.name: AC_Wv_Iter_Start_Winter
parameter.description: Start value for wv iterations

parameter.name: AC_Rng_Nbhd_Terrain_Corr
parameter.description: Range of neighborhood for terrain correction

parameter.name: AC_Max_Nr_Topo_Iter
parameter.description: Max. number of topography iterations

parameter.name: AC_Topo_Corr_Cutoff
parameter.description: Topographic correction cutoff

parameter.name: AC_Vegetation_Index_Th
parameter.description: Vegetation index threshold to distinguish soil/sand from vegetation

parameter.name: AC_Limit_Area_Path_Rad_Scale
parameter.description: Threshold to limit the area for path radiance scaling, haze-, DDV- and DBV-tests

parameter.name: AC_Ddv_Smooting_Window
parameter.description: DDV smoothing window size for spatial filtering

parameter.name: AC_Terrain_Refl_Start
parameter.description: Start value for terrain reflectance at terrain correction

parameter.name: AC_Spr_Refl_Percentage
parameter.description: Percentage of DDV pixels used in Scale Path Radiance for advanced return criteria

parameter.name: AC_Spr_Refl_Promille
parameter.description: Promille of reference pixels used in Scale Path Radiance for advanced return criteria

parameter.name: Use_L2A_PB_GIPP
parameter.description: Use configuration from L2A PB GIPP file
parameter.alias:
L2A_PB_GIPP file:
(If a file is selected,
the parameters below
will not be used)
